Turtles.description: This is a baby slider turtle. It is both small and cute. That is a pretty good turtle.

This is an artist rendition's of a turtle. It is nothing shortof amazing. This is the best turtle drawing you've likely ever seen and if you say otherwise you should be ashamed for lying. Have some decorum.

This is a tortoise. All tortoises are turtles, but not all turtles are tortoises. Regardless it's hard to tell that this is a real picture when next to the hyper realistic drawing to the left. We apologize.

Food.description: My personal favorite for my turtle
I give this to my turtle when hes getting chunky
